welcomeTitle: We offer customised musical performances for demanding customers
whoWeAreDescription: PrestMusic is a music service company, based in Paris, the fruit of a musical experience gradually acquired over more than 10 years. It is involved in events and offers several types of musical performances.
whatWeDoDescription: We value integrity, we want to stay more closely in touch with our customers, and to guarantee a quality service.

services.name: Live Concert
services.description: Are you a choir, music group or an artist? Are you looking for a keyboardist ?

services.name: Wedding
services.description: Are you looking for a keyboardist to further embellish your liturgical celebrations and improve your parties ? Contact us !

services.name: Beat Making
services.description: If you are looking for a less expensive solution for beats, contact us !

services.name: Formation
services.description: Learn the arranger Keyboard with the specialist Florin KAMGA! Discover a full progressive method for piano beginners. Get all the main notions and techniques to begin!

equipmentDescription1: The principal assets of PrestMusic is  all-in-one solution to provide many high quality services. We use an high-end arranger Keyboard, one of the best in the world.
equipmentDescription2: The TYROS 5, called The Power of Reality , is the ultimate performance keyboard created by Yamaha, with outstanding sounds, enhanced DSP effects, and accompaniment Styles so real it's like being backed by the worldâ€™s finest musicians. The Tyros5 brings a level of authenticity like no instrument before it.
